title: Forest Zipline
description: Have an exhilarating thrill Ziplining, it is safe and fun for children too.

title: Archery
description: An arrow can only be shot by pulling it backward. When life is dragging you back with difficulties,it means it's going to launch you into something great. So just focus and keep aiming.

title: Horse Riding
description: This is a great way to experience the spectacular scenery of Kirirom. Ninja and Cowboy costume also available.

title: ATV/ QUAD
description: Go as long as you can and then go Further.

title: Giant Bike
description: Feel the rich nature of Kirirom with a pleasant bike stroll
